alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 06 at 3:00PM CDT until April 06 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Jefferson County in central Alabama... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 300 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Johns, or 9 miles southwest of Hueytown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Birmingham, Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Bessemer, Homewood, Mountain Brook, Hueytown, Fairfield, Fultondale, Pleasant Grove, Tarrant, Midfield, Brighton, Lipscomb, Lake View, Sylvan Springs, North Johns, Birmingham Fairgounds, Five Points South and Ensley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
